title: Homesteading & Off-Grid Tips (Actually Tips for EVERYONE)

tasks.task: Attending a live homesteading and off-grid skills discussion

tasks.task: Discussing personal resilience and resourcefulness
subtasks: Drawing biblical support for perseverance (Hebrews 10:34-36)

Praying for viewers' week and extending gratitude
